messages.title: FAIR IS WORTH FIGHTING FOR
messages.content: Steve believes a new approach to managing the economy is needed. This should include a real commitment to protecting the planet. Bold ideas and political will must carry this forward.

keyPolicies.policyDescription: Steve is campaigning for safer streets and neighbourhoods.

keyPolicies.policyTitle: Support for local jobs and businesses
keyPolicies.policyDescription: More support for local jobs and businesses.
Insulating all our homes and buildings.
Investing in renewable energy from wind, solar, and wave. Adopting our policies will reduce carbon dioxide emissions by 90% by 2030.

issues.economy: Steve believes a new approach to managing the economy is needed. This should include a real commitment to protecting the planet.
issues.environment: Bold ideas and political will must carry this forward.

housing.content: Insulating all our homes and buildings.

leaflet.personalStatement: Steve grew up near Endcliffe Park and lives in Sheffield with his wife and two children. He is a former City Councillor and has worked in community development for the past ten years.

images.caption: Steve is campaigning for 20 mph speed limits in all residential areas.
